message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $80 to me, and I believe it could be very valuable to you. Let's start with an offer of $100 for the product. Looking forward to your response!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $75 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must respectfully decline. I am unable to lower the price below $100 due to the value I place on this product. I appreciate your interest and hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
